School of Extended and International Education



















Home






Give to EXCEL  
Summer 2023
We are getting ready for an exciting Summer 2023 and wanted to provide an update in hopes that you can get involved! This Summer, we are grateful to offer dynamic STEAM-based courses, from Engineering a Better Solar Oven to Manga and Pokemon Anime, PreMed for Kids, and much more!
Here's where we'll be this Summer:
*Please note that your child must attend one of the districts to be able to join. Your child's school/ district will be reaching out to you with registration details*


Santa Rosa City Schools
June 12 -16, 20-23
Session 1: 9-12 pm
Five classes availableSession 2: 1-4 pm
Five classes available
Coming soon!
Register Here (Santa Rosa City Schools District only)


Cotati Rohnert Park School District
June 26-30, July 10-14
Session 1: 9-12 pm
Two classes availableSession 2: 1-4 pm
Two classes available
CRPUSD families register through parent portal, please email Expanded_Learning@crpusd.org with questions


Twin Hills Union School District
July 17-21, 24-28
Session 1: 9-12 pm
Three classes availableSession 2: 1-4 pm
Three classes available
Register here (Twin Hills Union School District only)


We hope to be able to expand and make EXCEL for Youth available for more school districts come Summer 2024. While districts will be reaching out for registration, you can sign up for EXCEL for Youth news and updates below.
Wishing you a great rest of the season and hope to see you in the Summer!
EXCEL Inquiry Form

    Awards and Recognition  


EXCEL has been honored by the State of California with an Assembly Resolution presented by then Assemblyman Jared Huffman for our years of outstanding contributions to education, and is listed by Johns Hopkins Center for Talented Youth programs for gifted students.
